textBox.richText: Biography: I was born in Qingdao, China. I worked for Professor Xuhong Qian as a master student in East China University of Science and Technology and then was accepted as a PhD working for Professor Tony D. James in 2012, University of Bath, United Kingdom. In the early of 2015, I started my work as a joint-postdoc for Professor Eric V. Anslyn and Andy Ellington.
